sqlMap.select:
select * from etb_product T where 1 = 1 and status = 1
T.tradename = #tradename#
T.typeno = #typeno#
T.color = #color#
T.item10 = #item10#
T.packaging = #packaging#
T.makearea = #makearea#

select T.* from etb_product T where 1 = 1
T.status = #status#
T.fieldno = #fieldno#
T.supplierid = #supplierid#
T.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.item10 like '%$item10$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.color = #color#
T.keyword like '%$keyword$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.packaging = #packaging#
order by T.belongto,T.fieldno,T.tradename,T.typeno,T.color,T.item10,T.packaging,T.id asc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select count(*) from etb_product T where 1 = 1
T.status = #status#
T.supplierid = #supplierid#
T.fieldno = #fieldno#
T.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.item10 like '%$item10$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.color = #color#
T.keyword like '%$keyword$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.packaging = #packaging#
sqlMap.update: update etb_product set fieldno = #fieldno#, brand = #brand#, item1 = #item1#, item2 = #item2#, item3 = #item3#, tradename = #tradename#, typeno = #typeno#, color = #color#, packaging = #packaging#, unit = #unit#, sampleflag = #sampleflag#, productname = #productname#, makearea = #makearea#, supplierid = #supplierid#, salesprice = #salesprice#, purchaseprice = #purchaseprice#, note = #note#, item01 = #item01#, item02 = #item02#, item03 = #item03#, item04 = #item04#, item05 = #item05#, item06 = #item06#, item07 = #item07#, item08 = #item08#, item09 = #item09#, item10 = #item10#, item11 = #item11#, item12 = #item12#, item13 = #item13#, item14 = #item14#, item15 = #item15#, item16 = #item16#, item17 = #item17#, item18 = #item18#, item19 = #item19#, item20 = #item20#, item21 = #item21#, item22 = #item22#, item23 = #item23#, item24 = #item24#, item25 = #item25#, item26 = #item26#, item27 = #item27#, item28 = #item28#, item29 = #item29#, item30 = #item30#, pic01 = #pic01#, pic02 = #pic02#, pic03 = #pic03#, pic04 = #pic04#, pic05 = #pic05#, pdfpath = #pdfpath#, rank = #rank#, status = #status#, res01 = #res01#, res02 = #res02#, res03 = #res03#, res04 = #res04#, res05 = #res05#, res06 = #res06#, res07 = #res07#, res08 = #res08#, res09 = #res09#, res10 = #res10#, keyword = #keyword#, updateuid = #updateuid#, updatedate = NOW() where id = #id#
sqlMap.select:
select * from ( SELECT T.id,T.belongto,T.fieldno,S.warehousename,T.brand,T.item1,T.item2,T.item3,T.tradename,T.typeno,T.color,T.packaging,T.unit,T.sampleflag,T.productname,T.makearea,T.supplierid,T.salesprice,T.purchaseprice,S.productcost,T.note,T.item01,T.item02,T.item03,T.item04,T.item05,T.item06,T.item07,T.item08,T.item09,T.item10,T.item11,T.item12,T.item13,T.item14,T.item15,T.item16,T.item17,T.item18,T.item19,T.item20,T.item21,T.item22,T.item23,T.item24,T.item25,T.item26,T.item27,T.item28,T.item29,T.item30,T.pic01,T.pic02,T.pic03,T.pic04,T.pic05,T.pdfpath,T.rank,T.status,T.res01,T.res02,T.res03,T.res04,T.res05,T.res06,T.res07,T.res08,T.res09,T.res10,T.keyword,T.createuid,T.createdate,T.updateuid,T.updatedate, (select SS.suppliername from etb_supplier SS where SS.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername from ( SELECT W.productid,W.warehousename, SUM(W.taxamount)/SUM(W.quantity) AS productcost FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1 and W.warehousetype = '1'
W.belongto = #belongto#
group by W.productid,W.warehousename ) S, etb_product T WHERE T.id = S.productid
T.fieldno = #fieldno#
T.productid = #productid#
T.supplierid = #supplierid#
T.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.item10 like '%$item10$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.color = #color#
T.keyword like '%$keyword$%' ESCAPE '/'
) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
ORDER BY A.fieldno, A.tradename, A.typeno, A.color, A.item10, A.updatedate LIMIT #start#, #end#

select * from ( SELECT T.id,T.belongto,T.fieldno,S.warehousename,T.brand,T.item1,T.item2,T.item3,T.tradename,T.typeno,T.color,T.packaging,T.unit,T.sampleflag,T.productname,T.makearea,T.supplierid,T.salesprice,T.purchaseprice,S.productcost,T.note,T.item01,T.item02,T.item03,T.item04,T.item05,T.item06,T.item07,T.item08,T.item09,T.item10,T.item11,T.item12,T.item13,T.item14,T.item15,T.item16,T.item17,T.item18,T.item19,T.item20,T.item21,T.item22,T.item23,T.item24,T.item25,T.item26,T.item27,T.item28,T.item29,T.item30,T.pic01,T.pic02,T.pic03,T.pic04,T.pic05,T.pdfpath,T.rank,T.status,T.res01,T.res02,T.res03,T.res04,T.res05,T.res06,T.res07,T.res08,T.res09,T.res10,T.keyword,T.createuid,T.createdate,T.updateuid,T.updatedate, (select SS.suppliername from etb_supplier SS where SS.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername from ( SELECT W.productid,W.warehousename,SUM(W.taxamount)/SUM(W.quantity) AS productcost FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1 and W.warehousetype = '1'
W.belongto = #belongto#
group by W.productid,W.warehousename ) S, etb_product T WHERE T.id = S.productid
T.fieldno = #fieldno#
T.productid = #productid#
T.supplierid = #supplierid#
T.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.item10 like '%$item10$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.color = #color#
T.keyword like '%$keyword$%' ESCAPE '/'
) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
ORDER BY A.tradename, A.typeno, A.color, A.typeno, A.updatedate

select count(*) from ( SELECT T.id,T.belongto,T.fieldno,S.warehousename,T.brand,T.item1,T.item2,T.item3,T.tradename,T.typeno,T.color,T.packaging,T.unit,T.sampleflag,T.productname,T.makearea,T.supplierid,T.salesprice,T.purchaseprice,S.productcost,T.note,T.item01,T.item02,T.item03,T.item04,T.item05,T.item06,T.item07,T.item08,T.item09,T.item10,T.item11,T.item12,T.item13,T.item14,T.item15,T.item16,T.item17,T.item18,T.item19,T.item20,T.item21,T.item22,T.item23,T.item24,T.item25,T.item26,T.item27,T.item28,T.item29,T.item30,T.pic01,T.pic02,T.pic03,T.pic04,T.pic05,T.pdfpath,T.rank,T.status,T.res01,T.res02,T.res03,T.res04,T.res05,T.res06,T.res07,T.res08,T.res09,T.res10,T.keyword,T.createuid,T.createdate,T.updateuid,T.updatedate, (select SS.suppliername from etb_supplier SS where SS.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername from ( SELECT W.productid,W.warehousename,SUM(W.taxamount)/SUM(W.quantity) AS productcost FROM etb_warehouse W WHERE 1 = 1 and W.warehousetype = '1'
W.belongto = #belongto#
group by W.productid,W.warehousename ) S, etb_product T WHERE T.id = S.productid
T.fieldno = #fieldno#
T.productid = #productid#
T.supplierid = #supplierid#
T.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.item10 like '%$item10$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.color = #color#
T.keyword like '%$keyword$%' ESCAPE '/'
) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.typeno like '%$typeno$%' ESCAPE '/'
